title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore       We no longer carry products, such as books and CD/DVDs, at the Mississippi River Visitor Center. A selection of those products, however, are now carried by the Explore Store which is just across the lobby of the Science Museum from the Visitor Center. Sales items are provided to the Explore Store by the Jefferson National Parks Association (JNPA), our cooperating association. Much of what we once carried is also available online from JNPA. America the Beautiful public lands passes (Annual, Senior, Military, Access) are available at the Mississippi River Visitor Center. Please call 651-293-0200 for availability.
